column4: actionparsnip: yeah but for a newbie... it's not easy even with the man pages. Often times it doesn't work. Either I don't use the right switch or something else goes wrong. I will get used to it! I found it easier in DCL under VMS
actionparsnip: Your help is invaluable here on this channel inDEED.
actionparsnip: How can a normal human would have found that for the man page for clamav is clamscan! They are not make it easy at times.
